term.title: arsanylidenes

item.text: Recommended name for carbene analogues having the structure Râ€“As: (former IUPAC name is arsinediyls). A common non-IUPAC synonym is arsinidenes.

sources.item: PAC, 1995, 67, 1307. 'Glossary of class names of organic compounds and reactivity intermediates based on structure (IUPAC Recommendations 1995)' on page 1319 (https://doi.org/10.1351/pac199567081307)

term.disclaimer: The International Union of Pure and Applied Chemistry (IUPAC) is continuously reviewing and, where needed, updating terms in the Compendium of Chemical Terminology (the IUPAC Gold Book). Users of these terms are encouraged to include the version of a term with its use and to check regularly for updates to term definitions that you are using.
